name: Bizarre Plunger Crusade
description:
BPC is a comedy horror game where the player controls a plumber with the job of exercising a possessed toilet with your plunger. The player must explore the house while being berated by bad puns from the toilet.

This is my first original game I worked on that shipped!

-SOME THINGS OF NOTE-
F = toggle flashlight
You must alt+tab to close the game (sorry, this was an oversight when developing)

Currently version 1 without a plan for any updates, unless there is significant request for one.
